title: PS2 Workshop v1.0-Final.exe
description:
HI PS2 games friends ...

Ps2 WORKSHOP is the most complete tool for preparing PS2 games to be played in the PCSX2 emulator, USB drive, HARD Drive, PiratedCopys or Backups with lot of helping programs to prepare your games ...



WHAT IS NEW IN THIS FINAL 1.0 VERSION :
=======================================

- AUTOMATIC TEMP FOLDER REMOVING AFTER USING THE TOOL

(and with that STANDALONE EXECUTABLE completly functional)



TOOLS :
=======


- ImgBurn (to burn or construct your games) 

- PS2 Emulator (PCSX2 to play or test your games before burn)

- NTSC_Fix ( to convert the ISO from PAL to NTSC )

- PAL_Fix ( to convert the ISO from NTSC to PAL )

- ESR Disc Patcher ( to play ESR mode on the chipped PS2 )

- USBUtilUltimate ( convert ISO to USB with many options )

- ULTRAISO ( to check DVD properties and rebuild PS DVD ISOS )

- USBInsane ( to convert ISO to USB )

- USBExtreme ( to convert ISO to USB )

- ISO2USB ( to convert ISO to USB)

- CDGenerator ( to create Bin/Cue files )

- UMD ISO Shrinker ( to shrink the ISOS most as possible keeping DVD properties )

- APACHE 3 ( powerfull to get ISO extaction )

- Dual Layer Patcher ( to patch DualLayer PS2 games to burned on DVD9 discs)

- XPERT 2 ( amazing pack of plugins for many PS2 games to help creating ISOS )

- 0 Bytes Converter ( convert to 0 bytes all the files you want )

- PSS TOOLS ( pack of tools to work and watch and listen PS2 video and audio )

- PS2 SAVE TOOLS ( converters to several PS2 saves types and MC cards managers )



GAMING IS FOR EVERYONE
=======================




GLOBEPLUS FREEWARE TOOLS
========================






* enjoy ...
